mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (info_name, info_gender, info_birthday, info_email, info_address, info_age, info_desc, login_uid) values (#{info_name},#{info_gender},#{info_birthday},#{info_email},#{info_address}, #{info_age},#{info_desc},#{login_uid})
mapper.select: select id, name, gender, birthday, email, address, age, personal_profile, uid from userinfo where uid = #{uid}
